The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X X ▢ X X
X ▢ ▢ X X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
X ▢ ▢ X X
X X ▢ X X

DESCRIPTION: My grid consists of a 5x5 matrix with a pattern that resembles an X shape. The corners of the grid and the center positions are filled with X's, while the remaining positions form a cross shape with blank spaces (▢). Specifically, the first and last rows have three X's with a blank space in the middle, the second and fourth rows have two X's at the ends and three blank spaces in the middle, and the middle row is entirely made up of blank spaces.
